name: OrbSim
description:
A simple 2D physics-based orbit simulator. Inspired by https://hermann.is/gravity/.

Game saves are stored in OrbSim Unity_Data\Saves as .json files and can be manually edited.  A few example save files are provided with the game.

Controls

  • Middle Mouse Button - Scroll camera
  • Mouse Scroll Wheel - Zoom in/out
  • Tab - Open/close editor panel
  • Left Mouse Button - Create body when editor panel is open
  • Escape - Open/close options menu
  • Tilde - Unlock camera when locked to a body
  • Space - Pause simulation
  • . - Increase simulation time warp
  • , - Decrease simulation time warp

When mouse cursor is hovering over a body:

  • Middle Mouse Button - Pin body tooltip
  • Right Mouse Button - Lock camera to body
